item.description:
Chris Stolte has informed us of a great opportunity:

The Institute of Politics at the Government School here at Harvard is showing the debate this Wednesday on the big screen at the IOP forum. It'd be great if we could get a bunch of us there in our Ron Paul gear showing our support. I know the Harvard Students for Ron Paul facebook group is already trying to drum up some people to go, but the group is small. I think it'd really make a statement to have a great showing of Paul support at such a prestigious political venue.

It starts at 8 PM and is free to anyone!

Time: 8:00 pm - 11:00 pm
Location: John F. Kennedy Jr. Forum; 79 JFK Street, Cambridge, MA
Contact Info: 617-496-3864
item.name: Support Ron Paul at Harvard During the Debate
